params.question:
Given this code, which is used to sort applicants for a scholarship, and that "has_degree" can be either TRUE or FALSE...


if (income >= 2000) {
  if (has_degree) {
    eligibility <- "Qualified"
  } else {
    eligibility <- "Not Qualified"
  }
} else {
  eligibility <- "Not Qualified"
}

... which statement is TRUE?
